name: POV
description:
Find all of the clues and escape your grandma's basement before the bomb explodes!

Controls
----------------------------------

Movement -- WASD or Arrow Keys
Look -- Mouse
Interact -- Left Mouse
Zoom -- C
Adjust Zoom -- C + Mouse Wheel
Rotate Object While Holding -- Middle Mouse
Adjust Hold Distance -- Mouse Wheel while holding object

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTICE!

This game is having trouble running in certain Chromium browsers (MS Edge still works). This is less of a problem with the game and more of a problem with Itch, as far as I'm aware.  If you have an alternative browser like Mozilla Firefox or Microsoft Edge, I would suggest using it.
